title: Charles Stanley's Sermons (Christian) on MP3
description:
This is a set of encouraging Christian audio files (MP3s) by the US Preacher Dr. Charles Stanley. They run at about 20 minutes each, and cover many life's lessons based on Christian doctrine.

Files can be ticked to be downloaded separately once the torrent is selected. The files contained are:
